snippet: LEVIN--Kenneth. We note with sorrow the passing of our member, Kenneth Levin and extend sincerest condolences to his bereaved family. Angela W. Buchdahl and President Abby Pogrebin, Central Synagogue of New York City 1/3
lead_paragraph: LEVIN--Kenneth. We note with sorrow the passing of our member, Kenneth Levin and extend sincerest condolences to his bereaved family. Angela W. Buchdahl and President Abby Pogrebin, Central Synagogue of New York City 1/3
